sentences.en: By tradition , the Hebrew scriptures were usually preserved on leather rolls.
sentences.cn: 据传希伯来经典是写在皮革卷上的.

sentences.en: Caleb in Hebrew means : bold, impetuous . Caleb was the son of Jephunneh.
sentences.cn: 迦勒( 希伯来 语勇敢无畏之意)是耶孚尼的儿子.

sentences.en: Enoch's name signified in the Hebrew, Initiate or Initiator.
sentences.cn: 以诺的名字在希伯莱尤为重要, 是传授或教导者.

sentences.en: H . Paul confirmed historical events and people from Hebrew Scriptures.
sentences.cn: 保罗证实了历史事件和人从西伯来圣经.

sentences.en: He is a fluent speaker of Hebrew.
sentences.cn: 他说一口流利的希伯来语。

sentences.en: He sits puzzling over ancient Hebrew texts.
sentences.cn: 他坐在那里对着古老的希伯来文本大伤脑筋。

sentences.en: Hebrew used in Israel today; revived from ancient Hebrew.
sentences.cn: 现代以色列人所使用的希伯来语; 由古代希伯来语复兴而来.

sentences.en: It was in Babylon that the Hebrew people got their history together and evolved their tradition.
sentences.cn: 正是在巴比伦,希伯来民族积累了历史,发展了传统.

sentences.en: The blessing was said in Hebrew.
The Hebrew prophets developed the concept of one God, a national deity.
sentences.cn: 希伯来的先知们逐渐发展了一神论, 这个神是全民族的神.

sentences.en: The Kabala is an ancient Hebrew mystical system of thought.
sentences.cn: 卡巴拉是古代希伯来人神秘思想系统.

sentences.en: The prosperity of the Hebrew people was short - lived.
sentences.cn: 希伯来人的繁荣犹如昙花一现.

sentences.en: The story has points of resemblance to a Hebrew myth.
sentences.cn: 这个故事与某个希伯来神话有相似之处.

sentences.en: This is the oldest Hebrew manuscript in existence, ie that exists.
sentences.cn: 这是现存最早的希伯来语手稿.

words.tran_cn: 希伯来人，犹太人；希伯来语

trans.tran_cn: 希伯来人的，希伯来语的
trans.tran_en: Hebrew means belonging to or relating to the Hebrew language or people

trans.tran_cn: 希伯来人，犹太人，希伯来语
trans.tran_en: the language traditionally used by the Jewish people
